msbt.message: This place is definitely YOU, . Even I couldn't make it more you, and I'm me!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Glad to see you've got a quality here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />We spend three out of every four minutes of our lives sleeping, andYou think I've got the math wrong?Oh! You're right! So, I was saying, we spend four out of every five minutes of our lives sleeping

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I could almost forget I'm living in the middle of a remote island if I had one of these bad-boys! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So, what do you like to watch on your ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Well, welllook who's got !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I guess that's one way to stay in touch with the civilized world.The other would be my phone, which I look at literally every two seconds.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What are you doing with a clock? We're on island time, my friend!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh, wait! Is that really the time? "Celebrity Battle" is about to start! That's my favorite show! I've never missed a single episode!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yo, is that a real I see?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Didn't think I was into botany, eh? Let's have a botany battle! I'll get botanical on you!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice. Some folks don't like to take the time for a full bath, but I think it's always worth it. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />They wouldn't let me install one next to my desk at my last job, though Weird.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, you're using as a desk Very cool! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />With a desk like this, a screenplay practically writes itself."Open on a brooding, yet undeniably handsome staring out at the great unknown."
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I see you've got a genuine here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't trust the posterior to anything lessâ€”you've made a good choice.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, I didn't know you played the !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I used to be a demon on that thing. Ah, but I don't play anymore. I'm more of a vocal artist these days
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ah, I didn't know you liked to cook. I mean, I'm just assuming, based on this . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Orare you just using it as a decoration?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like the concept of working out, but the real-life execution leaves something to be desired
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />At first I couldn't figure out why you'd have in here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And then I realizedit makes no sense at all! Ha HA!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your illuminates this room like a pro.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />In a way, I feel like we're kindred spirits. I, too, light up every room I walk into.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, I see you have .I thought I already held you in the highest regard, but I realize now I was wrong. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />My respect for you has grown exponentially, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm so happy to see that you have .Clothing organization is something I'm deeply passionate about.And to know that it's important to you too, I tear up just thinking about it.
